data.name: Closers Gold Package
data.detailed_description:
Awesome items inside the Gold Package!
The Gold Pack consists of a full set Black Suit that will give you a distinctive look.
This pack also comes with three different kinds of 30-days vouchers, a powerful pet, and gear boosters all in just one package!

Details:
1. Black Suit Set Box X1
• Get dressed and beat them up!

2. +13 Gear Booster X2
• 100% chance of enhancing your gear to +13!

3. Mini Awakened Tiamat Pet Container X1
• Special and powerful pet!

4. Elite Status (30-Day) X1
• Get 30 days of the premium buff!

5. Gardening Voucher (30-Day) X1
• Get 30 days of farm planting support!

6. Maid Service Voucher (30-Day) X1
• Get 30 days of My Room exploration support!

Notes:
• Black Suit costume is available for all characters including Lucy.
• DLC contents will be delivered to your in-game delivery box.
• DLC packs can only be received once per account. Once you purchased it, you won't be able to receive the same pack again as a gift.
• All DLC packs will be updated every after a new character release. After the update, new characters may able to use its components.
• Look forward to more packs that will be released on Steam and in-game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelIntel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelIntel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050Ti or better graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
